--------------------------------------------------
CAUTION: This email originated from outside of the organization. Do not click links or open attachments unless you recognize the sender and know the content is safe. 
تم إرسال هذا البريد الإلكتروني من خارج مجموعة شلهوب. لا تنقر على الروابط أو تفتح المرفقات إلا إذا كنت تعرف المرسل وتعلم أنه آمن


Dear Sender ,

 

Thank you for your email .

 

I will be on Leave and I will be  unreachable on Wednesday December 25th (Only ).

 

I will have very limited access to both my phone and emails .

 

You can kindly communicate with your alternative contact at Marsh for any urgent request ,  or you may kinldy text me and I will revert to you at the earliest possible .

 

Best Regards,

Kev

 

 


________________________________
